name: Timberland Chocorua 8 in. Waterproof Insulated Boots - Men's
description:
Step into winter without worrying about cold feet. Built on one of Timberland’s classic models, the Chocura boots are tough enough for the backcountry, but have an edge of urban style. Layering waterproof leather, on top of a waterproof membrane, warm PrimaLoft® ECO insulation and a wicking fleece lining, these boots offer serious protection from the elements.Waterproof leather from a tannery rated Silver or higher by The Leather Working Group.TimberDry® waterproof breathable membrane is made using recycled plastic bottles.400 gram PrimaLoft® Eco synthetic insulation light, efficient and composed of 50% post-consumer recycled material.Fully-gusseted tongue.Supportive EVA midsoles.Grippy tread uses 34% recycled rubber.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
